attributes.action: Buy a new Britannia for use by the Queen
attributes.additional_details: She has missed the old one & it was never replaced. In an easier retirement stage it does not need to be huge just a nice design
attributes.background: The Queen is going to take things a little easier after her 90 birthday. Why not open a new fund for voluntary contributions to buy her a new royal yacht. It does not have to be very big just seaworthy & if possible British built.

rejection.details: It's not clear whether you would like the Government to buy a new royal yacht, or whether you would like the money to be raised from voluntary contributions (or a combination of the two). Petitions need to ask clearly for a specific action from the Government or Parliament.
